title: Any fonts like Sackers Gothic Heavy, but heavier?
content:
Hi,

Are there any fonts that look like Sackers Gothic but get even thicker than the Sackers Gothic Heavy? I need a font that has the same extended, modern sans-serif look, but gets even heavier.

Thanks!

| --- | --- |
| [Picture 38.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2038.png) | 7.45 KB |
author: talgoretsky

comments.content:
There actually isn't much that is "modern" about Sackers Gothic. It's derived from an old engraving style. But I think I get your drift. Here are a few:

[Proxima Nova Extrabold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/mark_simonson/proxima_nova_extrabold_ot/?sample_text=TYPOPHILES&sample_size=36)  
 [Proxima Nova Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/mark_simonson/proxima_nova_black_ot/?sample_text=TYPOPHILES&sample_size=36)  
 [ARS Maquette Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/arstype/ars_maquette_black/?sample_text=TYPOPHILES&sample_size=36)  
 [Titling Gothic Normal Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/titling_gothic_normal_bold/?sample_text=TYPOPHILES&sample_size=36)  
 [Titling Gothic Normal Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/titling_gothic_normal_black/?sample_text=TYPOPHILES&sample_size=36)  
 [Freight Sans Bold SC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/garagefonts/freight_sans_bold_sc/?sample_text=Typophiles&sample_size=36)  
 [Freight Sans Black SC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/garagefonts/freight_sans_black_sc/?sample_text=Typophiles&sample_size=36)  
 [Rhode Semibold Normal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/rhode_semibold_normal/?sample_text=TYPOPHILES&sample_size=36)  
 [Steeplate Gothic Shaded](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123023/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/red_rooster/steelplate_gothic_shaded/?sample_text=TYPOPHILES&sample_size=36) is a nice shadowed option
